name: Oh No! Bugs!
description: Oh No! Bugs! Is a casual arcade game where you squash bugs by pushing blocks. Play solo or with friends, locally or online!
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: AMD A10-7300 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon R6 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 275 DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
